summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing their whereabouts and activities during a trip to Brazil and Argentina. Staley mentions spending time with Joe Lewis in Bariloche, Argentina, and reading a book on Rwanda. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be privileged information.

keyFacts: Jes Staley arrived in Salvador, Brazil, on December 26, 2009.
Jes Staley spent a day with Joe Lewis in Bariloche, Argentina.
Jes Staley is reading a book on Rwanda during his trip.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be privileged information.
